code: import data from'./assets/products.json';export var getProducts=function getProducts(){return new Promise(function(resolve){setTimeout(function(){resolve(data);},500);});};export var getProductById=function getProductById(productId){productId=parseInt(productId);return new Promise(function(resolve){setTimeout(function(){resolve(data.find(function(prod){return prod.id===productId;}));},500);});};export var getProductsByCategory=function getProductsByCategory(categoryId){categoryId=parseInt(categoryId);return new Promise(function(resolve){setTimeout(function(){resolve(data.filter(function(prod){return prod.category_id===categoryId;}));},500);});};
